body_html:
@robbine : I'm not sure I fully understand your problem, but just to be clear, tf.train.Saver saves only variables to the checkpoint - it does not save the output of all nodes in the graph.

Does that answer your question?
body_text:
@robbine : I'm not sure I fully understand your problem, but just to be clear, tf.train.Saver saves only variables to the checkpoint - it does not save the output of all nodes in the graph.
Does that answer your question?
body:
@robbine : I'm not sure I fully understand your problem, but just to be clear, [`tf.train.Saver`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/state_ops/saving_and_restoring_variables#Saver) saves only variables to the checkpoint - it does not save the output of all nodes in the graph.

Does that answer your question?
